about_the_game:
Carefully observe the abnormalities in the room.
If you do something that doesn't follow the correct steps,
you will be stuck in the loop of this dream forever.

This game will reflect the story of a salaried worker,
one who works hard, bears the burden of debt, and is constantly overwhelmed by stress,
leading to sleeping problems.





You will play as this salaried worker living in an apartment room.
When you wake up, you must determine whether your room is in its original state or not.
Pay close attention to the objects inside the room.
Otherwise, you will have to start all over again from the beginning.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Somnium is a FPS horror spot the difference game
with simple gameplay mechanics where you must memorize
what your "normal" room looks like
and observe whether anything has changed within the room.

The first time, you will wake up before midnight,
and you must remember the state of your room.


When you go to bed, you will wake up again in the middle of the night,
and you must notice if your room is still the same as before.

If it remains unchanged, you need to go to the toilet and then return to sleep.
Failing to follow this procedure will send you back to the beginning at midnight.

However, if something in your room has changed or disappeared,
you should go back to bed without visiting the toilet.

If you enter the toilet when your room is not in its normal state,
you will also be sent back to start over at midnight.



To break free from this looping event, you must be observant and follow the steps correctly to advance the time until dawn.

Oh, and also... if you wake up and find yourself not in your bed, you need to get back to your bed as soon as possible.



-----------------------------------------------------------------------

This game draws inspiration from the renowned puzzle game The Exit 8,
and has been lovingly crafted out of a profound passion for the puzzle genre.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Play time

10 - 60 minutes

Game difficulty

If you make a mistake, you will start playing again from the beginning (midnight).

Save function

The game will automatically save each time you sleep.

Controls

Mouse and keyboard, or Xbox controller

Graphics settings

If your computer experiences frame rate drops while playing, it is recommended to change the overall graphic settings to "Low".
